intro: Hypodematium sinense, commonly known as the Chinese hypodematium, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, commonly known as the buckwheat family. The plant is characterized by its delicate, clustered inflorescences and small, greenish-yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as mountain forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
